about_the_game:
Embark on an otherworldly odyssey unlike any other in "Beyond Horizon - The Astral Expedition." Step into a realm where reality and dreams converge, and the line between the possible and the fantastical blurs.

Awaken amidst towering insects, surrounded by a surreal landscape that defies explanation. With the guidance of a mysterious companion, learn to navigate this enigmatic world, mastering movement controls as you traverse its surreal expanse.

Customize your journey by selecting your outfit from the companion's wardrobe, adding a personal touch to your adventure. As you delve deeper into the astral realm, uncover the truth behind your existence: to return to reality, you must reach a mystical orb guarded by powerful forces.

Driven by a desire to break free from this dreamlike state, embark on a quest to collect the orb and restore order to the distorted world around you. Along the way, uncover fragments of your past life through flashbacks, adding layers of intrigue to your journey.

Participate in missions to rebuild the city, contributing to its restoration while unraveling the secrets hidden within the astral realm. But beware, moments of memory recall and sudden lapses challenge your perception of reality, blurring the boundaries between dreams and truth.

Join the inhabitants of the city in celebrating its reconstruction, seizing the opportunity to escape the confines of the astral realm. However, as you venture forth, the grip of memory outages tightens, threatening to obscure your path.

Experience a captivating tale of self-discovery and determination in "Beyond Horizon - The Astral Expedition." Will you break free from the confines of this surreal realm, or will the allure of the astral keep you captive? Embark on your odyssey today and unlock the secrets that lie beyond the horizon.

short_description: Awaken in a surreal realm of giant insects and blurred reality. Guided by a companion, master movement, customize your outfit, and uncover your past. Complete missions to rebuild the city and pursue a mystical orb to return to reality. Will you escape or remain captivated by the astral world?
